body:
I like the idea of humans.txt, but dislike having the framework core team listed in individual apps.

The core team is not involved in coding the app; if you take that route you might as well mention the core developers of Rack, the web server and the OS.

Why not just use the example humans.txt verbatim? http://humanstxt.org/Standard.html

It even gives proper examples:


                            
/* TEAM */
Your title: Your name.
Site: email, link to a contact form, etc.
Twitter: your Twitter username.
Location: City, Country.

/* THANKS */
Name: name or url

/* SITE */
Last update: YYYY/MM/DD 
Standards: HTML5, CSS3,..
Components: Modernizr, jQuery, etc.
Software: Software used for the development
